name: Robert P. Casey, Jr.
content: .@POTUS’ #BuildBackBetter Act includes my #BetterCareBetterJobs Act, which invests in home and community-based services and caregiving jobs. It’s a critical first step toward ensuring quality health care and services for seniors and people with disabilities. twitter.com/nbcnews/status…
text: buildbackbetter act includes bettercarebetterjobs act invests home communitybased services caregiving jobs critical first step toward ensuring quality health care services seniors people disabilities twittercomnbcnewsstatus

name: Lloyd Doggett
content: In our Build Back Better Act, we plan to overcome the GOP obstruction and provide an opportunity for care for the two million Texans left uninsured in the Medicaid gap. To finally assist those working Texans left out and left behind for far too long. https://t.co/NKNfVsSBbb
text: build back better act plan overcome gop obstruction provide opportunity care two million texans left uninsured medicaid gap finally assist working texans left left behind far long

name: John Garamendi
content: 88% of Americans support lowering prescription drug prices. It’s long past time for Congress to listen and act. That’s why I’m supporting the #BuildBackBetter Act, which will allow Medicare to negotiate lower drug prices, cap out of pocket spending on prescriptions, and more.
text: americans support lowering prescription drug prices long past time congress listen act thats im supporting buildbackbetter act allow medicare negotiate lower drug prices cap pocket spending prescriptions

name: Michael F. Doyle
content:
The #BuildBackBetter Act combats health disparities & the U.S. maternal mortality crisis by:
✅Extending Medicaid postpartum coverage
✅Diversifying the perinatal workforce
✅Investing in maternal mental health equity
text: buildbackbetter act combats health disparities us maternal mortality crisis byextending medicaid postpartum coveragediversifying perinatal workforceinvesting maternal mental health equity

name: Kurt Schrader
content: "Now there is a compromise that looks modest but could have real bite." The @UpshotNYT explains how my drug pricing proposal in the #BuildBackBetterAct will drive down prescription drug costs, especially for seniors, while protecting the innovation of new treatments and cures. twitter.com/UpshotNYT/stat…
text: compromise looks modest could real bite explains drug pricing proposal buildbackbetteract drive prescription drug costs especially seniors protecting innovation new treatments cures twittercomupshotnytstat

name: Cori Bush
content:
The Build Back Better Act is a racial justice bill.

Community violence prevention.
Affordable housing expansion.
Supporting child care and elder care workers.

Policies that are crafted to support Black and brown folks.

We need to get it across the finish line.
text: build back better act racial justice billcommunity violence preventionaffordable housing expansionsupporting child care elder care workerspolicies crafted support black brown folkswe need get across finish line

name: Adam Smith
content:
Improving the quality of caregiving jobs will, in turn, help improve the quality of care provided to seniors and people with disabilities. 
 
The #BuildBackBetterAct will deliver affordable, high-quality care for our loved ones while supporting the workers who provide this care. twitter.com/seiu775/status…
text: improving quality caregiving jobs turn help improve quality care provided seniors people disabilities buildbackbetteract deliver affordable highquality care loved ones supporting workers provide care twittercomseiu775status

name: Michael F. Doyle
content:
I’m proud to support the #BuildBackBetter Act that invests in our nation’s future through funding to:
✅ #LowerDrugCosts
✅ Close Medicaid Coverage Gap
✅ Permanently extend CHIP
✅ Increase pandemic preparedness  
✅ Make health care more affordable
text: im proud support buildbackbetter act invests nations future funding lowerdrugcosts close medicaid coverage gap permanently extend chip increase pandemic preparedness make health care affordable
